text: Tara'i ki tomara prabhura karuna bhaga-bamta kare? Amara'i e'i duniyara jibane tadera jibika tadera madhye bhagabatoyara kare di'i, ebam tadera ka'uke aparera upare maryadaya unnata kari, yena tadera ke'u-ke'u aparake sebarata kare nite pare. Ara tomara prabhura karuna besi bhala tara ca'ite ya tara jama kare.
